data.title: Baptista de Acuna by Polo, Juan Manuel et al.: Hardcover (1980)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9788424806170 - Hardcover - Euzko Americana de Ediciones, Caracas, Venezuela - 1980 - Light grey cloth over boards; Color illus. dj.; 56 pp.; 11 bw figures; 53 color plates. Text in Spanish; Part of the Maestros del Arte Iberoamericano series; Includes biographical and exhibition information about this Venezuelan painter. VG-/VG (Some rippling to pages; Minor wear to dj. at extremities) - Baptista de Acuna
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

ASSUMPTIONS: By ordering a book from me, I will assume you have read my terms of

sale and agree to them. Once the books leave my hands, any non-delivery issue is between you and the

post office or other delivering party. If you refuse insurance, I want you to

know in advance I DO NOT REFUND for non-delivered books, nor the postage

required to not get them to the address provided. See insurance costs below.

PAYMENT: We accept PAYPAL/MC/VISA, Discover, checks and money orders drawn on

US banks. Ca...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

WE ARE NO LONGER SHIPPING INTERNATIONAL ORDER THROUGH ABE. Please visit our website: www.mullenbooks.com for instructions placing an order directly with us.

For the EU regulations: Business Name: Mullen Books. Inc. Physical address is 121 Walnut Street, Columbia, PA 17512. Email: orders@mullenbooks.com Phone: 717-618-0481 Fed EIN: 36-4693068 Please address complaints to: Kevin Mullen, President P.O. Box 472 Marietta, PA 17547
